completion.item: <[!CDATA[Activates an itemParameters: gara.jswt.ListItem item - the item that should added to the ListThrows: TypeError - if the item is not a ListItem ]]>

Event e - event the users triggers

<[!CDATA[Adds an item to the list (invoked by the constructor of ListItem)Parameters: gara.jswt.ListItem item - the item that should added to the ListThrows: TypeError - if the item is not a ListItem ]]>
<[!CDATA[Register listeners for this widget. Implementation for gara.jswt.Widget ]]>
<[!CDATA[Selects a range. From the item with shift-lock to the passed item.Parameters: gara.jswt.ListItem item - the item that should be selectedThrows: TypeError - if the item is not a ListItem ]]>
